Pre-Game Insights: Hungary are undefeated on home soil since September 2022 and will head into the midweek clash as clear favorites.
Bosnia have lost their last seven games on the bounce and 12 of their last 15 across all competitions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary were ranked 31st in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 44 places above their midweek opponents.
The two teams last faced off in a European Championship qualifying clash back in September 2007 which Magyarok won 1-0 via a first-half strike from former Fulham man Zoltan Gera.
Others: The visitors are without a clean sheet in all four of their games in this fixture.
Hungary have lost three of their last four games after losing just one of their previous 16.
